name: Hunter & Bard
description:
Hunter & Bard is an award-winning, Bay Area based, public relations agency that provides strategic PR and design services for the US market to companies worldwide. Your brand deserves to be remembered and we’re here to help you leave the right impression and start meaningful conversations with your people. 
Our PR services include media & analyst relations, influencer outreach, content development & planning, event pitching & planning, and press coverage. We offer a wide variety of specialized design services to meet your business needs, including custom web design, gamification, website optimization, UX/UI, development, logo design/branding, event booth and material design. Hunter & Bard works closely with clients to ensure consistency, clarity, and delivery of results.
